parsing_result:
# Viewing Pictures

Read this section for information on playback zoom and multi-frame playback.

Use the rear command dial to go from full-frame playback to playback zoom or multi-frame playback. Rotate the rear command dial to right or left, the display changes as shown. The display changes in reverse order when rotating the dial to the opposite direction.

> To cancel playback zoom or multi-frame playback, press **DISP/BACK** or **MENU/OK**.

!Playback Zoom and Multi-frame Playback

- **Maximum zoom**: Zoom in to the maximum level.
- **Medium zoom**: Zoom in to a medium level.
- **Full-frame playback**: View the image in full-frame.
- **Multi-frame playback**: 
  - **Nine-frame view**: Display nine images at once.
  - **Hundred-frame view**: Display one hundred images at once.
